name: Pool Blitz
description:
The world is ready for the best mobile pool game ever made! Challenge your friends, enter pool tournaments, and go head to head against players in real time.

Shoot pool with ultra-realistic physics, breath-taking graphics, and more fun than you’ve had in real life!


Pool Blitz has something for every Pool fan. Choose 8-Ball for an authentic pool experience, or Blitz mode for a fast-paced pool battleground.

Pick your mode!

Download Pool Blitz today, and enjoy a unique concept with super easy controls. Fun and intuitive gameplay!


POOL BLITZ FEATURES

● Stunning, hi-res graphics
● Unique, super-easy control system
● First portrait pool game - play with one hand!
● Classic 8 Ball mode and fast-paced Blitz mode
● Play games with friends - invite up to 7 friends to multiplayer tournaments
● 8-Ball and Blitz Tournaments - complete with spectator mode
● Revolutionary shot system that makes playing 3D pool as easy as 2D
● Range of special Power Cues to help pull off super shots!
● Collect and upgrade cues, balls and player avatar masks
● Banter with your opponents using chat and emojis at the end of each pool game


Whether you’re a pool pro or a wannabe pool shark, Pool Blitz is the game for you!

Download the hottest new pool game now, and BLITZ the competition!
